cleaned_text: Consultations - Holistic Lifestyle Counseling with Adrianna (sessions booked by appointment only) WHAT IS AYURVEDA? - Ayurveda is considered the oldest healing science. In Sanskrit, Ayurveda means "The Science of Life." Ayurvedic knowledge originated in India more than 5,000 years ago and is often called the "Mother of All Healing." Every person is made of five basic elements found in the universe: space, air, fire, water, and earth. The combination of these elements form three life forces or energies called Doshas, which control how your body and mind operates.
